definition: to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on
to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control
to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)
to depend on/to be dependent on
Rice (name)/Condoleezza Rice (1954-) US Secretary of State 2005-2009
to trust/to have confidence in/to have faith in/to rely on
Lai Changxing (1958-), notorious Xiamen mafia boss involved in large scale corruption and smuggling, extradited from Canada back to China in 2008
the Dalai Lama/abbr. of 達賴喇嘛|达赖喇嘛[Da2 lai4 La3 ma5]
to refuse to admit (what one has done)/to disavow/to renege
bored to death (idiom)/bored stiff/overcome with boredom

sentences.chinese: 许愿就是债，欠了不容赖。

sentences.english: For human-rights activists and sympathizers of the Dalai Lama in Western countries, their actions can be called a failure.
sentences.chinese: 人权份子和西方哒赖的同情者们的举动是失败的。

sentences.english: He has been hanging on in my room.
sentences.chinese: 他一直赖在我的房间不走。

sentences.english: I’m looking forward to staying in bed.

sentences.chinese: 许愿就是债，欠了不容赖。

sentences.english: This is an iron-clad fact which cannot be denied.
sentences.chinese: 这是铁的事实，是赖不掉的。

sentences.english: She prefers to brazen it out rather than admit defeat.
sentences.chinese: 她宁可厚着脸皮赖下去，也不愿承认失败。

sentences.english: The Master had an allergy for people who protracted their stay at the monastery.
sentences.chinese: 大师最反感赖在修道院不走的人。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, news of what she has done has spread far beyond Riceville.
sentences.chinese: 事的消息不胫而走，远远地传出了赖斯维尔镇以外。

sentences.english: Filled with the fruit of justice, through Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.
sentences.chinese: 赖耶稣基督满结义德的果实，为光荣赞美天主。

sentences.english: Seeing off Carrefour or Tesco is just one of Lai's goals.
sentences.chinese: 为家乐福或者乐购送行只是赖先生的目标之一。

sentences.english: Phoebe convinces him to keep living.
sentences.chinese: 菲比劝他好死不如赖活着。

sentences.english: I used to lie on the floor and watch the changing scenery.
sentences.chinese: 我习惯赖在地上看著这变幻无穷的风景。

sentences.english: Kinglony 's success depends on talent excellence, dedicated staff.
sentences.chinese: 金隆的成功，有赖才干卓越，尽心尽力的员工。

sentences.english: Every morning, hang on to a bed, forget day plan.
sentences.chinese: 每天早晨，赖在床上不愿起来，忘记一天的计划。

sentences.english: Grace for the trials, help from above, Unfailing sympathy, undying love.
sentences.chinese: 试炼得恩助，危难有赖，无限的体谅，不死的爱。

definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
camel/white horse with a black mane (archaic)
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
